about_the_game:
Embark on a journey of intrigue, romance, and adventure in Lust & Legends, a mature open-world RPG that plunges players into the vibrant and immersive realm of Astoria. As a young squire named Tristan, players must navigate the complexities of a medieval world filled with secrets, mysteries, and desires.

Key Features:



Detailed 3D World: Explore the sprawling kingdom of Astoria, filled with lush forests, towering mountains, bustling villages, and ancient ruins. From the majestic castles of noble houses to the seedy back alleys of shadowy guilds, every corner of the world is meticulously crafted to immerse players in its rich tapestry of history and lore.



Experience the emotional depth and authenticity of each character in Lust & Legends' through professional voice acting. From the sultry whispers of seductive courtesans to the booming commands of fearsome knights, the voice cast brings each character to life with nuance and realism, drawing players deeper into the game's narrative.

Emotionally Engaging Storyline: Uncover the secrets of Astoria as Tristan, a young squire with dreams of knighthood. Delve into a gripping narrative filled with political intrigue, forbidden romance, and personal growth as Tristan navigates the complexities of a kingdom on the brink of turmoil. With multiple branching paths and morally ambiguous choices, players' decisions will shape Tristan's fate and the destiny of Astoria itself.

Playing as Tristan, players will encounter six captivating ladies, each with their own desires, secrets, and motivations. From the feisty tavern wench intrigued by forbidden knowledge to the seductive courtesan with ties to the nobility, players must navigate intricate relationships and delicate courtship rituals to win the affections of their chosen companion. With branching romance paths and meaningful interactions, Lust & Legends offers a deeply personal and emotionally resonant experience.



Dynamic Gameplay: Engage in thrilling combat, intricate puzzles, and challenging quests as you journey through Astoria with a wide variety of side activities and mini-games, there's always something new to discover in the world of Lust & Legends. Prepare to embark on an unforgettable adventure in Lust & Legends, where passion and peril await at every turn. Will you uncover the truth of Astoria's secrets and find love amidst the chaos, or will you succumb to the temptations of power and desire? The choice is yours in this epic tale of lust and legends.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MACOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MACOS 11 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 2400 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher

name: Lust & Legends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080 and higher ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 equivalent or greater ; ATI radeon RX and higher
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: integrated or higher
